price: 37. Ieder mens zal op die Dag meer dan genoeg aan zorgen hebben.
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nīhi
